function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"The focus on health and wellness in buildings may not adequately address contagious disease propagation","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease spread within buildings","Mitigation":"Implement additional measures to specifically address contagious disease control and prevention","Technologies":"Air purifiers, UV-C sterilization, touchless amenities","People":"Building occupants, visitors, maintenance staff","Owner":"Building owners, property managers, facilities management"},{"Description":"The pandemic-related 'Health and Safety' rating system does not directly address contagious diseases in residential buildings","Impact":"Limited capability to manage and prevent the spread of contagious diseases within residential buildings","Mitigation":"Develop and integrate specific protocols and guidelines for contagious disease management in residential buildings","Technologies":"Smart building systems, air quality sensors, touchless technologies","People":"Building owners, property managers, local health authorities","Owner":"Building owners, property managers, facilities management"}]}
